des:
The 1Home skill lets KNX and Loxone homeowners to start using Amazon Alexa voice control. The automatic detection of devices and a friendly interface make this the simplest way to voice control! 1Home connects your home with Alexa in 5 minutes. No technical knowledge required.

1Home is the top-rated solution to upgrade your smart home with Amazon Alexa platform.

How to start:
Start your free trial at my.1home.io to test the Cloud connection. Connect your home and enable the 1Home for KNX and Loxone skill for Amazon Alexa on your Amazon account. 

Then your KNX/Loxone devices will be imported into the Amazon Alexa mobile app, ready to be controlled with voice, tap or automated.

Works with:
 - All KNX smart homes
 - Loxone Miniserver

No Alexa speaker in your home yet? No problem, you can use voice control via your Alexa mobile app on your smartphone or tablet.

Our support team is always ready to help you at support@1home.io
